title: Chicken Cobbler
ingredients: ['75g butter', '1 onion, chopped', '5 tablespoons plain flour', '350ml chicken stock', '160ml milk', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper', '150g frozen garden peas', '125g diced carrots', '275g cooked, shredded chicken meat', 'For the scone-topping', '250g plain flour', '2 1/2 teaspoons baking powder', '3/4 teaspoon salt', '5 tablespoons butter or margarine', '180ml milk']
